io.sphere.sdk.search.model

Class RangeTermFacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.search.model.RangeTermFacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the resource
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>

    public class RangeTermFacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
extends Base
    Model to build range and term facets and filters.

    • Method Detail

      • byRange

        public RangeFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byRange(FilterRange<java.lang.String> range)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with an attribute value within the given range, along with the facet for all ranges for this attribute. For example: filtering by [3, 7] would select only those elements with values between 3 and 7, inclusive, while the facet would contain statistical information about the range.
        Parameters:
        range - the range of values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given range and a facet expression for all ranges

      • byAnyRange

        public RangeFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAnyRange(java.lang.Iterable<FilterRange<java.lang.String>> ranges)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with an attribute value within any of the given ranges, along with the facet for all ranges for this attribute. For example: filtering by [[3, 7], [5, 9]] would select only those elements with values within 3 and 7, or within 5 and 9, both inclusive, while the color facet would contain statistical information about the ranges.
        Parameters:
        ranges - the ranges of values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given ranges and a facet expression for all ranges

      • byAllRanges

        public RangeFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAllRanges(java.lang.Iterable<FilterRange<java.lang.String>> ranges)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with an attribute value within all the given ranges, along with the facet for all ranges for this attribute. For example: filtering by [[3, 7], [5, 9]] would select only those elements with values within the range intersection [5, 7], inclusive, while the color facet would contain statistical information about the ranges.
        Parameters:
        ranges - the ranges of values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given ranges and a facet expression for all ranges

      • allRanges

        public RangeFacetAndFilterExpression<T> allRanges()
        Generates an expression to select all elements, without filtering, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.
        Returns:
        a bundle of an empty filter expression and a facet expression for all terms

      • allTerms

        public TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> allTerms()
        Description copied from interface: FacetAndFilterSearchModel
        Generates an expression to select all elements, without filtering, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.

      • by

        public TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> by(java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from interface: FacetAndFilterSearchModel
        Generates an expression to select all elements with the given attribute value, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by "red" color would select only those elements with "red" value, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Specified by:
        by in interface FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
        Parameters:
        value - the value to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given value and a facet expression for all terms

      • byAny

        public TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAny(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
        Description copied from interface: FacetAndFilterSearchModel
        Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching any of the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by ["red", "blue"] color would select only those elements with either "red" or "blue" value, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Specified by:
        byAny in interface FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
        Parameters:
        values - the values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given values and a facet expression for all terms

      • byAll

        public TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAll(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
        Description copied from interface: FacetAndFilterSearchModel
        Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching all the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by ["red", "blue"] color would select only those elements with both "red" and "blue" values, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Specified by:
        byAll in interface FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
        Parameters:
        values - the values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given values and a facet expression for all terms

        Parameters:
